issue.message: "<fragment>" looks like an XML reference; surround with backtics in string to display as symbol, e.g. \`<fragment>\`
Single sentence error messages should not end with a period
The issue summary should be shorter; typically just a 3-6 words; it's used as a topic header in HTML reports and in the IDE inspections window

issue.message: "getViewLifecycleOwner()" looks like a call; surround with backtics in string to display as symbol, e.g. \`getViewLifecycleOwner()\`
issue.errorLine1: getViewLifecycleOwner() should be used as the LifecycleOwner rather than the \
